listData.description: Versatile and competitive no frills credit card with low rates, low annual fee and great discounts for home loan borrowers.

bundles.name: Partnership Advantage Bundle
bundles.description: Customers with an active, fully funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan also receive benefits on our credit card products.

features.additionalInfo: This account can be used to send an NPP payment.
Visa Debit Card available to Australian Residents and members aged > 14 years
Apple, Samsung and Google Pay can be attached to the product on request.
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.

features.additionalValue: This account can be used as the target of an NPP PayID.
features.additionalInfo: Speed isn’t the only major advance of the NPP and Osko. Rather than needing hard-to-remember BSBs and account numbers, Osko users can make transactions using a ‘PayID’. This can be their mobile number, personal email or ABN.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.
Ability to make extra payments or repay the balance in full at any time.
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges may apply.
Up to 55 days interest free on purchases

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum loan amount of $500 applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must demonstrate at least 6 months continuing employment history at the time of application.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where a direct debit request is rejected by us due to insufficient funds in your account.

fees.name: Over Limit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each day that a Direct Debit or Cheque transaction is debited to a member which results in a deposit or overdraft account being drawn beyond its available balance or limit.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Your first 10 cheque deposits to your membership each month are free, each subsequent deposit will be charged per cheque.

fees.name: Over the Counter Withdraw
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per counter withdrawal or debit transfer once the monthly limit of 6 included withdrawals is exceeded.

fees.name: Your Choice Visa Credit Card Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies on 31st of March each calendar year after initial funding of your “Your Choice Visa” account. Fee does not apply to additional cardholders on the same Your Choice Visa account.

discounts.additionalInfo: $40 Annual Fee waived for customers who hold an active, funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Annual Fee waived for customers who hold an active, funded Partnership Advantage Home Loan.

fees.name: Additional Card Holder Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you add an additional cardholder to the account.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you make a Cash Advance.

fees.name: Direct Debits and Credits
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you make a transaction through a direct debit or credit.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each bank cheque you order from us.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you make a late payment.

fees.name: Staff-Assisted External Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when a staff provides assistance with an external transfer in branch.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest is per annum (p.a.). For each purchase that a member makes they will receive an interest free period of up to 55 days. Each monthly statement will show a payment due date that is at least 24 days from the statement date. The member does not pay any interest on purchases on that statement until after the due date. This means that all purchases receive at least 24 days interest free, and if the purchase is made early in the monthly statement cycle the member will receive up to 55 days interest free.

Interest is per annum (p.a.). 3.00% discount applies to the standard purchase rate if a Your Choice Visa is held on the same membership as an active, funded Home Loan. For each purchase that a member makes they will receive an interest free period of up to 55 days. Each monthly statement will show a payment due date that is at least 24 days from the statement date. The member does not pay any interest on purchases on that statement until after the due date. This means that all purchases receive at least 24 days interest free, and if the purchase is made early in the monthly statement cycle the member will receive up to 55 days interest free.

Interest is per annum (p.a.). The Cash Advance rate for this product is equal to the relevant purchase rate. Applicable discounts also apply. Interest is charged immediately on any cash advance. Internal branch transfers that debit the Your Choice Visa will be treated as a cash advance and interest will be charged immediately. BPAY transactions from Your Choice Visa accounts will be treated as cash advances and interest will be charged immediately.

features.additionalInfo: Track payments with SMS and email alerts
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.

features.additionalValue: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions
features.additionalInfo: No withdrawal fees at Regional Australia Bank ATMs. Transactions at other financial institutions’ ATMs may incur a fee. The Cash Advance rate may apply.
Up to 45 days interest free on purchases
Ability to make extra payments or repay the balance in full at any time.
24/7 Visa Platinum Concierge Service
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges may apply.

you'll earn 0.75 Qantas Points for every $1 you spend on eligible purchases – up to $10,000 and 7,500 points in each statement period. Plus you'll earn a bonus additional Qantas Point for every $1 spent on Qantas products and services. Best of all, you'll enjoy complimentary Qantas Frequent Flyer membership so you can start collecting points right away, as well as an additional 10,000 points every year!
Visa Debit Card available to Australian Residents and members aged > 14 years
Apple, Samsung and Google Pay can be attached to the product on request.

Qantas Points and Qantas Bonus Points are subject to the Regional Australia Bank Visa Conditions of Use and the Qantas Frequent Flyer Terms and Conditions. Eligible purchases do not include fees, cash, cash equivalent transactions, BPAY, refunds and balance transfers debited from the card account. To be eligible, the account must be open and not in arrears at the time of crediting points within that monthly statement cycle. Selected Qantas products and services are Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account, and Qantas Frequent Flyer and Qantas Club membership joining and annual fees apply. Excludes Jetstar, Qantas Holidays, Qantas branded non airfare products, Qantas Freight and Qantas Staff Travel. A joining fee usually applies however, this joining fee will be waived by Regional Australia Bank. It is available to new applicants who are not already Qantas Frequent Flyer members and who apply for membership online through qantas.com/joinffregionalaustraliabank. This offer is non-transferable and not available in conjunction with any other offer. Qantas Frequent Flyer membership and each application is subject to approval by Qantas. To be eligible for the additional 10,000 bonus points the facility must not be in arrears at any time during the yearly period, bonus points will be credited on the 11th month anniversary of the yearly period and every 12 months thereafter.
Get in control of your finances and use additional accounts for budgeting.

listData.name: Regional Australia Bank Home Loan (Fixed Owner Occupied)
listData.description: Our fixed-rate home loan is a great option if you'd prefer to lock in your home loan repayments and stay on top of your budgeting.

features.additionalInfo: Weekly, Fortnightly or Monthly repayments available.
A fixed interest rate provides you with certainty over your future repayments during the fixed period.
No Approval, Monthly or Annual Fees.
Ability to split your loan is available with this product
Dedicated Relationship Manager

constraints.additionalInfo: The Regional Australia Bank Home Loan is only available for borrowings with over $500 of new lending.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must be aged 16 or older to apply. Applicants under 18 years of age, but over 16 years, may only enter into a loan contract with an adult as co-applicant or guarantor.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
Minimum Deposit of 5% is required (with Lenders Mortgage Insurance)
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a mortgage relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments and we are required to issue a default notice to you.

fees.name: Late Payment Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: Loan Top Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A “top up” is additional borrowing against a property that we hold an existing mortgage over. This fee applies on approval of the additional borrowing.

fees.name: Title Search
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to perform a title search relating to a property offered, or held, as security for your loan.

fees.name: Property Valuation Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to value each property offered or held as security at the commencement of your loan, and when required throughout the life of your loan.

fees.name: Agency Settlement/Handing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies in the event that we require an agent to attend a settlement or handle documentation, relating to your loan.

fees.name: Loan Restructure Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you switch your existing Regional Australia Bank home loan to a different loan type, other than a Partnership Advantage.

fees.name: Registration of Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a discharge of mortgage relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Registration of Transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a transfer of land relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: PEXA Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we process a settlement relating to your loan through PEXA.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare discharge of mortgage documentation relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies every year in the month in which your Regional Australia Bank Home Loan was first funded.

fees.name: Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you get your loan approval for funding.

fees.name: Monthly Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Monthly Service Fee is a flat monthly fee which entitles your Loan.

fees.name: Break Cost Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you want to payout the facility early.

detailData.name: Regional Australia Bank Home Loan (Fixed Owner Occupied)
detailData.description: Our fixed-rate home loan is a great option if you'd prefer to lock in your home loan repayments and stay on top of your budgeting.

listData.name: Farm Management Account
listData.description: A tax-effective investment that allows primary producers to set aside pre-tax income as a cash reserve for later years.

features.additionalInfo: Helps balance good and bad times, by allowing eligible customers to set aside their individual pre-tax income in good years as a cash reserve to withdraw from in less profitable years.

detailData.name: Savings Booster Account
detailData.description: Boost the interest on your savings every month that you stick to your savings plan!

listData.name: Internet Maximiser Account
listData.description: The Internet Maximiser Account is an online savings account that pays a competitive rate of interest.

features.additionalInfo: Combined balances of up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed and secured by the Australian Government.
This account can be used as the target of an NPP PayID.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.
Track payments with SMS and email alerts.
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.
Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions.
Transactions to and from this account can only be conducted electronically (other than an opening or closing transaction).

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum balance of $1 is required to earn interest on this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Your first 10 cheque deposits to your membership each month are free, each subsequent deposit will be charged per cheque.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Where a direct debit request is rejected by us due to insufficient funds in your account a Dishonour Fee will apply.

fees.name: Access Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Access Fee is a flat monthly fee which entitles your membership to unlimited withdrawals via EFTPOS, ATMs, Internet, Phone and Mobile Banking.

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies for each day that a Direct Debit or Cheque transaction is debited to a member which results in a deposit or overdraft account being drawn beyond its available balance or limit.

fees.name: Bank Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when ordering a bank cheque.

fees.name: Over the Counter Withdraw
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you make a over the counter withdraw.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest is per annum (p.a.). A standard interest rate applies to all balances. Interest is calculated on the daily balance and paid to the account monthly.

listData.name: Regional Australia Bank Home Loan (Non Offset)
listData.description: Reduce interest charges on your variable rate home loan by having a redraw facility.

features.additionalInfo: Minimum redraw amount is $500.
Weekly, Fortnightly or Monthly repayments
split loans allowed
Dedicated Relationship Manager

constraints.additionalInfo: The Regional Australia Bank Home Loan is only available for borrowings with over $500 of new lending.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must be citizens or permanent residents of Australia.
Borrowers must be aged 16 or older to apply. Applicants under 18 years of age, but over 16 years, may only enter into a loan contract with an adult as co-applicant or guarantor.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
Minimum Deposit of 5% is required (with Lenders Mortgage Insurance)
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a mortgage relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments and we are required to issue a default notice to you.

fees.name: Late Payment Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: Loan Top Up Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A “top up” is additional borrowing against a property that we hold an existing mortgage over. This fee applies on approval of the additional borrowing.

fees.name: Title Search
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to perform a title search relating to a property offered, or held, as security for your loan.

fees.name: Property Valuation Costs
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to value each property offered or held as security at the commencement of your loan, and when required throughout the life of your loan.

fees.name: Agency Settlement/Handing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies in the event that we require an agent to attend a settlement or handle documentation, relating to your loan.

fees.name: Loan Restructure Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you switch your existing Regional Australia Bank home loan to a different loan type, other than a Partnership Advantage.

fees.name: Registration of Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a discharge of mortgage relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Registration of Transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we are required to register a transfer of land relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: PEXA Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Contain service fees charged to us, on behalf of members, by other financial institutions or organisations. This fee applies when we process a settlement relating to your loan through PEXA.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare discharge of mortgage documentation relating to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies every year in the month in which your Regional Australia Bank Home Loan was first funded.

fees.name: Approval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you get your loan approval for funding.

fees.name: Monthly Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Monthly Service Fee is a flat monthly fee which entitles your Loan.

fees.name: Break Cost Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you want to payout the facility early.

fees.name: Agency Settlement/Handing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies in the event that we require an agent to attend a settlement or handle documentation, relating to your loan.

fees.name: PEXA Processing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we process a settlement relating to your loan through PEXA.

fees.name: Late Payment Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when you fail to make your contracted repayments by the repayment due date.

fees.name: Mortgage Documentation Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare mortgage documentation relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Preparation
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to prepare discharge of mortgage documentation relating  to a property held as security for your loan.

fees.name: Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Applies when we are required to register a mortgage relating to a property offered as security for your loan.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Contact Regional Australia Bank for details interest rate details. Rates will vary based on the individual circumstances of each borrower.
